sentence.Network_en: Speakers have been shouted down, classes disrupted, teachers made to grovel.
sentence.Network_cn: 发言人的声音被叫嚷声盖住了，课堂一片混乱，老师们不得不好言相劝。
我对谁都不会卑躬屈膝。

sentence.Network_en: Don't grovel — stick up for yourself!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语中有哪些单词易混淆的?_爱问知识人 ... grotto 小洞穴 grovel 卑躬屈膝 groveler 卑躬屈膝者.
asepsis的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ...  grovel 趴, 匍匐, 卑躬屈膝... glutton 暴食者, 酷爱...的人.
求WOW命令大全~_爱问知识人 ... /groan（ 呻吟） /grovel（ 趴） /guffaw（ 狂笑）.
以g开头的英语英文单词 ... groupage 合并装运 grovel 摇尾乞怜，奴颜婢膝 groveler 乞怜者.

list.abs: He said he would never grovel before a conqueror ., 他说他永远不会在征服者脚下摇尾乞怜.
The frightened slaves groveled at the feet of their cruel master ., 那些吓坏了的奴隶匍匐在残暴的主人脚下.
grovelling around under the table looking for a pin ., 在桌子下爬来爬去寻找一根针.
flatter fawn cringe 畏缩，谄媚grovel adulate （程度最深）几组形近词

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: back-formation from the obsolete adverb grovelling, from obsolete groof, grufe 'the face or front' (in the phrase on grufe, from Old Norse á grúfu 'face downwards') + the suffix -ling

entry.def: If you say that someone grovels, you think they are behaving too respectfully towards another person, for example because they are frightened or because they want something.

example.tran: 我对谁都不会卑躬屈膝。

example.ex: Speakers have been shouted down, classes disrupted, teachers made to grovel.
example.tran: 发言人的声音被叫嚷声盖住了，课堂一片混乱，老师们不得不好言相劝。

entry.def: If you grovel, you crawl on the ground, for example in order to find something.

example.ex: We grovelled around the club on our knees.
example.tran: 我们趴在俱乐部的地上四处找。

auth_sentence.content: A telephone call...advises that a grovel is owed to the M.P.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: A telephone call...advises that a grovel is owed to the M.P.

auth_sentence.content: Murdoch was not the only media potentate to grovel to a repressive regime.
auth_sentence.res_content: Murdoch was not the only media potentate to grovel to a repressive regime.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Murdoch was not the only media potentate to grovel to a repressive regime.

auth_sentence.content: Don't suggest that any one should grovel, and don't lead any revolutions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't suggest that any one should grovel, and don't lead any revolutions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't suggest that any one should grovel, and don't lead any revolutions.
